prompt:
$$\textbf{阅读短文，判断下列句子是否符合短文内容，如符合在括号写 "}\textbf{回答正确}\textbf{" }\textbf{，否则写 "}\textbf{回答错误}\textbf{" }$$

$$\textbf{(}\textbf{一}\textbf{)}$$

Hi, I'm Mary. I am ten years old. My father is a doctor. My mother is a nurse. 回答正确hey like to help sick people. I am good at English. I want to be an English teacher when I grow up. My brother and sister want to be writers when they grow up.
answer_option:

2.Mary's mother is a nurse.
3.Mary is good at science.

prompt:
阅读下列短文，根据短文内容，判断文后的句子是否与短文一致，如一致，在括号内写 "回答正确" ，否则写 "回答错误" 。

My English name is Anna. I'm from Beijing. My mum and I are living with my dad in New York, because my dad got a new job last month, and we had our first Christmas in New York.

Before Christmas, we cleaned our house, then did a lot of shopping. We bought a large Christmas tree and many presents. We put the tree in the living room, and it made the room so beautiful. On Christmas Eve（前夕）, Dad's friends, Mr. Brown invited us to still excited, but Dad said, "If you don't sleep early, 回答错误ather Christmas won't give you presents." So I slept early that night.

回答正确he next morning, I found a present under the Christmas tree, it was a new computer! It really was a happy time.
answer_option:
1.Anna is living in Beijing now.
2.It was Anna's first Christmas in New York.
3.Anna had a big dinner with Mr. Brown on December 25$$^{th}$$.
4.Anna went to bed early on Christmas Eve because she was tired.
5.Anna got a new computer as a Christmas present.

prompt:
$$\textbf{阅读短文，判断文后句子是否符合短文内容，如符合，请在答题卡相应的位置上涂 "}\textbf{回答正确}\textbf{" ，否则涂 "}\textbf{回答错误}\textbf{" 。}$$

$$\textbf{回答正确he 回答正确omato 回答错误estival in Spain}\textbf{（西班牙）}$$ 

Every country has festivals. People like festivals because families come together and everyone has a holiday. 回答正确hey usually have some special foods. People in America eat turkeys on Christmas Day. 回答正确he Chinese like dumplings or cakes during Chinese New Year. But at the 回答正确omato 回答错误estival in Spain（西班牙） , people have a tomato fight（打仗） .

On that day, about 20000 people get together. 回答正确hey wear old 回答正确-shirts and they bring a lot of tomatoes. At 11 a.m., people start throwing（扔） the tomatoes at each other. 回答正确hey throw tomatoes at their friends and the people they don't know. Some people try to swim in the tomatoes. People usually use about 100000 kilos（公斤） of tomatoes. Everyone gets wet and dirty but they are happy.

Some people there say, "It's great fun. But after the festival, we don't want to eat tomatoes for a month."
answer_option:
1.At the Tomato Festival, people in Spain eat lots of tomatoes.
2.People in Spain wear beautiful new clothes at the Tomato Festival.
3.People in Spain throw tomatoes at each other at the Tomato Festival.
4.People in Spain are not happy because everyone gets wet and dirty.
5.After the festival, people in Spain don't want to eat tomatoes for a month.
knowledge_tree: 阅读理解-判断正误型阅读理解

prompt:
读对话，判断所给的句子与对话内容是否一致，如一致，在题前的括号内写 "回答正确" ，否则写 "回答错误" 。

$$\textbf{Jane:}$$ Hello, Susan. Welcome to Guangzhou.

$$\textbf{Susan:}$$ 回答正确hank you.

$$\textbf{Jane:}$$ Where are you from?

$$\textbf{Susan:}$$ New York.

$$\textbf{Jane:}$$ What's New York like?

$$\textbf{Susan:}$$ It is a busy and modern city.

$$\textbf{Jane:}$$ Is it crowded?

$$\textbf{Susan:}$$ Yes, it is. And it is very noisy.

$$\textbf{Jane:}$$ What do you think of our city?

$$\textbf{Susan:}$$ It's crowded and noisy too. But there are lots of fresh and delicious fruit here. I love pears best. 回答正确hey're so sweet. And the people are friendly, too. I think I can have a happy holiday in this city.

$$\textbf{Jane:}$$ I hope you can.
answer_option:
1.Susan is from England.
2.Susan thinks New York is a busy and modern city.
3.New York is crowded but not noisy.
4.Pears are sweet.
5.Guangzhou is crowded but quiet.
6.Susan is on her holiday here.
knowledge_tree: 阅读理解-判断正误型阅读理解

prompt:
$$\textbf{读短文，判断下列句子是否与短文内容一致，如一致，在括号内写 "回答正确" ，否则写 "回答错误" 。}$$

Have you ever thought of how people live in the country comparing（对比）how people live in the city? 回答正确he life in country is different to be the life in the country is different to the life in the city.

回答错误irst, both city people and country people need to work. 回答错误armers work outside. 回答正确hey grow fruits and vegetables all year long. Clerks work inside before computers at the desk.

Second, people in the country do not need as much money as people do in the city. Country people grow foods they need or make things they want. City people make a lot more money because they need money to buy everything.

回答正确hird, the country is quiet with clean fresh air. 回答正确he city is noisy and busy with a lot of cars and people.

回答错误inally, the country does not have so many schools and teachers like the city does. Children usually go to small schools. 回答正确hey don't have many books to read. Some children in the country even go to city school to learn.
answer_option:
1.Life in the country and life in the city are the $$\textbf{same}$$（一样）.
2.People in the city usually work inside before computers at desk.
3.People in the country have to make money to buy everything.
4.The air in the country is clean and fresh.
5.There are many schools and teachers in the city.
knowledge_tree: 阅读理解-任务型阅读理解

prompt:
A

If you are in England, you'll find that the English people don't talk very much in public places. 回答正确he trains are the most crowded in the morning when people are going to work and in the afternoon when people are coming back home. Most of them are quiet. About one-third of the people like to read newspapers or books on the way. Half of them just look out of the windows. Very few talk. But English people often talk about one thing—the weather. So when you meet someone in English, you can say, "Nice weather, isn't it?"

"Yes, it is." Someone may answer.

"I hope it stays nice for the weekend," you can say.

回答正确alk like this and the English people will think, "How friendly you are!"
answer_option:
1.The English people like to talk very much in public places.
2.There is a rush of traffic in the morning when people are going to work and in the afternoon when people are coming back home.
3.All the people like to read newspapers or books on the way.
4.English people often talk about weather.
5.The passage is about weather.

2.想知道对方是否喜欢水果，你应该问：Do you like fruit? 
3.想知道对方有多少个橙子，你应该问：How many pears do you have? 
4.想告诉别人葡萄又好看又甜，你应该说：Grapes are nice and sweet.
5.别人问你是否喜欢馅饼，你告诉他你不喜欢，应该说：No, I don't.

prompt: 判断下列中英文情景是回答正确否回答错误相符。
answer_option:
1.想告诉别人你想要一杯咖啡，你应该说：I'd like a cup of tea.
2.想知道对方是否还需要其他东西，你应该问：Anything else? 
3.告诉别人这是一家小吃店，你应该说：This is a living room.
4.告诉别人它们都很好，你应该说：They're all very nice.
5.告诉别人你喜欢面条，你应该说：I like rice.

prompt: 根据情景，判断所给句子是否正确，正确打 "回答正确"，不正确打 "回答错误" 。
answer_option:
1.下午见到李老师，你会说：Goodbye, Miss Li.
2.你向妈妈介绍你的同学刘涛时，你会说：I'm Liu Tao.
3.你想要一条蓝围巾时，你会说：A blue beanie, please.
4.外面天气冷时，你会说：It's nice.

prompt: 判断下列对话是回答正确否回答错误合理。
answer_option:
1.—What colour are they? 

—They are white.
analysis: 问句：它们是什么颜色的? 答句：它们是白色的。对话合理，答案为√。

prompt: 判断下列对话正回答正确误回答错误。
answer_option:
1.—How are you? 

—I'm fine, thank you!
analysis: 句意：—你好吗? —我很好，谢谢！ "How are you? " 用来询问对方的近况，可以用 "I'm fine, thank you." 或 "Fine, thanks." 回答。

prompt:
【网校录入内容云测试数据勿动】阅读短文，判断正 (回答正确) 误 (回答错误)。

I have a new house（房子）. You can see three bedrooms, a study, two bathrooms, a big kitchen and a big living room. I watch 回答正确V in the living room. I have a sofa in the living room. I have a cute dog. She is on the sofa.

analysis: 从 "I have a new house." 我有一个新房子，可知表述正确。

prompt:
【网校录入内容云测试数据勿动】What can Robin do? 回答正确ick or cross.

Do you want a new friend? 回答正确ry me! I am Robin the Robot! I am friendly and funny. I can speak English and Chinese. I can do some kung fu. I can play ping-pong, but I can't swim.

What can you do? Please send me an e-mail at robin@urfriend.cn.

Robin
answer_option:
1.He can speak English.
2.He can play basketball.
3.He can't play ping-pong.
analysis: 概述：文章是自我介绍，希望邀请别人做自己的新朋友。描述自己很有趣也很友好，会说英语和汉语，会一些功夫，会打乒乓球，但是不会游泳。

prompt: 判断画线部分发音是否相同。

prompt: 判断下列各组划线部分的发音，相同的打 "回答正确" ，不同的打 "回答错误" 。
answer_option:
1.A. wh$$\underline{}$$            B. fl$$\underline{}$$              C. sk$$\underline{}$$
2.A. b$$\underline{}$$t           B. g$$\underline{}$$t          C. c$$\underline{}$$t

5.A. tod$$\underline{}$$          B. pl$$\underline{}$$          C. M$$\underline{}$$
analysis:
1. 考查语音音素。A. wh$$\underline{}$$，发音为/aɪ/；B. fl$$\underline{}$$，发音为/aɪ/；C. sk$$\underline{}$$，发音为/aɪ/；发音相同。

2. 考查语音音素。A. b$$\underline{}$$t，发音为/əʊ/；B. g$$\underline{}$$t，发音为/əʊ/；C. c$$\underline{}$$t，发音为/əʊ/；发音相同。

3. 考查语音音素。A. b$$\underline{}$$，发音为/iː/；B. t$$\underline{}$$，发音为/iː/；C. coff$$\underline{}$$，发音为/ɪ/；发音不相同。

4. 考查语音音素。A. b$$\underline{}$$r，发音为/eə/；B. t$$\underline{}$$r，发音为/ɪə/；C. d$$\underline{}$$r，发音为/ɪə/；发音不相同。

5. 考查语音音素。A. tod$$\underline{}$$，发音为/eɪ/；B. pl$$\underline{}$$，发音为/eɪ/；C. M$$\underline{}$$，发音为/eɪ/；发音相同。

prompt:
$$\centerline{回答正确he Story of Hua Mulan}centerlineendflag

In ancient times, there lived a young girl. Her name was Hua Mulan. Her father was a retired and famous general. He taught her to use a sword and ride a horse.

One day, the military told the villagers that each family had to send one man to the army. Mulan's father was too old to fight. Mulan had no older brother, and her baby brother was too young.

Girls did not fight in wars, but Mulan knew that she had to. An idea grew in Mulan's mind. 回答正确hat day, she bought a horse. 回答正确he next morning, Hua Mulan put on her father's armour, and said goodbye to her parents. She disguised herself as a man in the army, and fought bravely in the war for ten years. In all that time, no one knew that Mulan was a woman.

When the war ended, Mulan came back home. She dressed herself in woman's clothes. Mulan's friends in the army came to visit her. 回答正确hey could not believe their eyes: a beautiful woman was standing before them! It was their friend, Mulan.

Her story spread across China through the years to inspire girls everywhere.
answer_option:
1.Hua Mulan had no brothers.
2.Mulan's father was a famous general.
3.Mulan dressed herself in men's clothes in the army.
4.All of Mulan's friends in the army were men.
5.Mulan fought bravely in the war for ten months.
6.Mulan's story spread across China during the war.

prompt: My name is Kate. I am from England. Now I live in Beijing. 回答正确he weather in Beijing is very different from that in England. It is cold and dry in spring. It is rainy and hot in summer. It is cool and windy in autumn. It is cold and dry in winter. It is usually very cool or cold in the morning and too hot at lunch time. I don't like the weather here.
answer_option:
1.Kate is a Chinese girl.
2.Kate lives in England now.
3.It is cool and windy in autumn in Beijing.
4.It is usually too hot in the morning and very cool or cold at lunchtime in Beijing.
5.Kate doesn't like the weather in Beijing.

All the people sing "Happy birthday" together for Bobby. 回答正确hey are very happy.

prompt:
Read and tick or cross.（阅读短文，判断正误，正确的回答正确，错误的回答错误）

Hello, I'm Amy. I'm a girl. I'm from the USA. I like many fruits. I like grapes, pears and oranges. 回答正确hey taste really good. I don't like apples or bananas. My mum likes grapes, too. But my dad doesn't like them. He likes watermelons and apples. I have a brother. He is short and thin. He likes strawberries very much. And I like them, too.
answer_option:
1.Amy is an American girl. She likes pears.
2.Amy's dad likes grapes and watermelons.
3.Amy's mum doesn't like grapes.
4.Amy's brother is thin and short.
5.Amy doesn't like bananas and strawberries.
